item.description:
Hi all -

Since the hour is getting late and I haven't received too many responses (my fault not yours) I am going to schedule the Meetup at Tufts for 8:30 AM tomorrow morning (Saturday).

I don't know if the courts are going to be dry and I imagine that the group will get kicked off at 10AM for Tufts practice, but I know there a bunch of you interested in playing in the morning.

Hopefully you'll be able to get some good hitting in.

I will not be able to attend either Meetup this weekend, so please let me know how it goes and how many people attend.

Thanks and happy hitting

Adam
item.name: Saturday Morning at Tufts
